feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX4][Dedicated Servers] - 54B15
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 20, 07:00 - 09:00 UTC

Jul 4, 21:39 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 20/07/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 20/07/2023 09:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers unreachable during maintenance (30 minutes max per server)
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will relocate the servers from rack 54B15 to rack 54B18.

entry.title: [Global][VirtualPrivateServers] - Modification Creation Suppression
entry.content:
Jul 5, 06:39 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 05/07/2023 06:00 UTC
Service impact : Modification Creation Suppression of VPS are unavailable
Related Incident : [EU/BHS/APAC][Publiccloud] - Keystone (authentication) API
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
